note: Data extracted from Granicus RSS feed and AgendaViewer. Upcoming meeting dates are confirmed from the Jan 22 2026 board agenda. Future dates are projected based on 4th-Thursday pattern.

meeting_schedule.board_meetings: 4th Thursday of each month at 9:00 AM
meeting_schedule.committee_meetings: Week prior to board meeting, starting at 9:00 AM
meeting_schedule.note: Meeting time updated to 9:00 AM per recent agendas (previously listed as 10:00 AM on website)

meetings.location: METRO Board Room, 1900 Main St, 2nd Floor, Houston, TX 77002

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes of the Board meeting on December 18, 2025 E. Brock
Public Comments (*Speakers must register 48 hours in advance) E. Brock
Annual Election of Board Officers and Committees E. Brock
METRO Chair Comments E. Brock
METRO Interim President & CEO Comments T. Jasien
Monthly Working Committee Reports E. Brock
Infrastructure & Mobility Planning - B. Fry
Customer Experience, Operations & Business Development - T. Preston
Finance & Business Administration - T. Morales
Audit & Human Resources - H. Vilaseca
Public Safety- T. Preston
Proclamations in appreciation of METRO retirees with 25 years or more of service E. Brock
Request Board acceptance of the monthly committee reports, including the investment report T. Morales

Request Board authorization to approve a Memorandum of Understanding with the Harris County Housing Finance Corporation for coordination of a proposed development adjacent to the Burnett Transit Center B. Fry

Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a contract modification with Wilson Building Services Inc. to extend the term and increase maximum contract amount, to provide rehabilitation services for METRO's Central Store Fire Suppression System B. Fry
Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to execute a three (3) year contract with Cummins Southern Plains, LLC for the purchase and delivery of transmissions T. Preston
Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to execute a three (3) year contract with Holt Truck Centers of Texas, LLC for the purchase and delivery of engines T. Preston
vendors: Holt Truck Centers of Texas, LLC

agenda_items.title: Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a three (3) year contract with two (2) one (1) year options with RailPod Inc., to provide annual track geometry, overhead contact system height & stagger, and wire wear measurement services on METRO's Red, Green, and Purple rail corridors T. Preston

Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a one (1) year contract Tidypro Partners, LLC to provide painting services at thirty-four (34) rail station canopies T. Preston

Request Board approval for the Interim President & CEO to request funding from the Federal Transit Administration (FTA) and to direct grant actions as necessary for Fiscal Year 2025 Formula Grant Funds, including Sections 5307 Urbanized Area Formula, 5310 Enhanced Mobility of Seniors and Individuals with Disabilities, 5337 State of Good Repair, and 5339 Bus and Bus Facilities T. Morales

Request Board designation of Ban Tien, METRO Chief of Police, to act on behalf of the authority in the administration and management of a grant issued by the Office of the Texas Governor Criminal Justice Division for the purchase of rifle-resistant body armor T. Morales

Request Board approval for the Interim President & CEO for the submittal of an application to the Office of the Governor of the State of Texas for Grant Funds under the FY2027 Peace Officer Mental Wellness & Resilience Grant program T. Morales

Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to direct the transfer of the administration of health and welfare benefits for the union represented employees from the Health and Welfare Trust (H&WT) to METRO's administration T. Morales

Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a two (2) year contract with Texas Materials Group, Inc. for the alsphalt and concrete paving for mobility improvements (package #3) on an as needed basis B. Fry

Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a five (5) year contract with two (2) one (1) year options with each of AECOM, Midtown Engineers, CONSOR Engineers LLC, Ardurra Group, Inc, HR Green, Inc, BGE, INC, infra TECH, and EXP U.S. Services, Inc for design services for budgeted and planned construction projects on an as needed basis B. Fry
Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a lease agreement with Houston First Corporation for a METRO Police Department storefront B. Fry

Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a three (3) year contract with two (2) one (1) year options with Cummins Southern Plains LLC, for the maintenance and repair of Cummins diesel and CNG engines on METRO buses T. Preston
Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a sole source contract with New Flyer Industries Canada ULC, for the repairs of CNG Bus 2092 T. Preston
Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a contract with New Flyer of America Inc, for the purchase of one hundred (100) CNG transit buses T. Preston

Request Board authorization for the Interim President & CEO to negotiate and execute a three (3) year contract with two (2) one year options with Inter-Con Security Systems, Inc. for unarmed security guard services T. Preston
